item.title: UBER
item.description: score:-11 Chances: Uber stock surged in 2023 as the company turned profitable. Younger investors are more likely to chase momentum behind earnings, especially across tech stocks like Uber. Risks: Wendyâ€™s will experiment with dynamic pricing, introducing digital menu boards with fluctuating prices and promotions, which could impact consumer spending on Uber’s delivery services.
